amendment.description: Amendment prevents the Department of Interior from partnering with private organizations to create or expand national heritage areas in southeast Colorado.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 47 printed in House Report 114-683 to prevent the Department of Interior from partnering with private organizations to create or expand national heritage areas in southeast Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Buck.
